mdRecord.dcterms:title: Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photograph of visitors at Mount Vernon posing on the east lawn in front of the southeast corner of the Mansion. In the front row is the Korean Minister and Legation, April 26, 1888. From left to right: Ye Chong Ha (staff at the Korean Legation), Pak Chung Yang (1st Minister of Korean Legation in Washington D.C. from 1887.08~1888.11), Kang Jin Hee (staff at the Korean Legation), Ye Ha Yong (second secretary at the time when the photo was taken, later became Chargé d’affaires of Korean Legation at Washington DC from 1888.11~1889.06, preceded by Pak Chung Yang).
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
